fixedbase base

rotjoint j2 0 1 0
trans t1 1 0 0
rotjoint j3 1 0 0
prisjoint j4 0 1 0

%mass 4
%inertia 3 0 0 0 3 0 0 0 3
%point c1
rigidbody b0 _ _ _  _ _ _  4  3 0 0 0 3 0 0 0 3


endmodel
